dustmaker package¶

Submodules¶

dustmaker.BitReader module¶

class dustmaker.BitReader.BitReader(data)[source]¶

Allows integers to be read in little endian byte order from a sequence of bytes.

align(size=8)[source]¶

Aligns the bit stream to a given multiple of bits. Default alignment is 8-bit alignment.

size – The desired bit alignment.

more()[source]¶

Returns true if there are more bits to be read.

read(bits, signed=False)[source]¶

Reads the next bits bits into an integer in little endian order.

bits – The number of bits to read. signed – Indicates if the MSB is a sign bit.

read_bytes(num)[source]¶

Returns a bytes object containing the next num bytes from the bit stream.

num – The number of bytes to extract from the bit stream.

skip(bits)[source]¶

Skips bits bits in the bit stream.

bits – the number of bits to skip.

dustmaker.BitWriter module¶

class dustmaker.BitWriter.BitWriter[source]¶

Allows integers to be written in little endian byte order into a bytes object.

align(size=8)[source]¶

Aligns the bit stream to a given multiple of bits. Default alignment is 8-bit alignment.

size – The desired bit alignment.

byte_count()[source]¶

Returns the number of bytse written so far.

bytes()[source]¶

Returns a bytes object containing all written data so far.

write(bits, val)[source]¶

Writes val as a bits bit integer in little endian order to the bit stream.

bits – The number of bits in val. val – The value of the integer.

write_bytes(data)[source]¶

Write the bytes given by data to the stream.

data – The bytes to write to the stream.
